title: A self-sensing omnidirectional pendulum harvester for smart oceans
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01171F, Paper
Jie Zhao, Zutao Zhang, Lei Zeng, Weizhen Liu, Jianhong Zhou, Yingjie Li, Yongli Hu, Xiaoping Wu, Yanping Yuan
We propose a wave energy harvester based on a spherical gear mechanism, which can convert the collected wave energy, after being integrated by a series of mechanical mechanisms, into electrical energy and power various offshore electrical devices.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
